resources.string: We care about your privacy and data security. We keep this app %1$s by using third party services.

We use %1$s in this app. This service (including it\'s partners) collects unique identifiers and other personal data. You can change your choice at anytime in the app settings. Learn more about this service and your personal data.

We use %1$s in this app. Those services (including their partners) collect unique identifiers and other personal data. You can change your choice at anytime in the app settings. Learn more about those services and your personal data.
By agreeing, you are confirming that you are over the age of 16.
Can we continue to use your data for this purposes?
We use following third party services in this app:
Click on a service to check out it\'s privacy policy%1$s.
or click following to check out our apps privacy policy

We won\'t collect your data for personalized advertising. Although non-personalized ads don\'t use mobile ad identifiers for ad targeting, they do still use mobile identifiers for frequency capping and aggregated ad reporting as well as for combating fraud and abuse."
I confirm, that I\'m 16 years or older
No thank you, I want to buy the app
I understand that I still see ads, but they may not be as relevant to my interests.
Please confirm your age before continuing
Please accept all services before continuing
